newsitem.title: POLAND: Zloty firms vs basket, one-day depos fall.
newsitem.headline: Zloty firms vs basket, one-day depos fall.

text.p: 1310 GMT - The Polish zloty closed at 3.34/3.30 pct from the parity rate, stronger than Friday's 3.15/3.13 pct after light currency-selling on speculation and small foreign entry into Polish T-bills, dealers said.
* It closed at 3.0350/60 to the dollar, down from 3.0310/15 on Friday and at 1.7912/20 to the mark, up from 1.7970/90.
* O/N at 21.36/21.63 pct vs opening's 21.90/22.30 pct.
* T/N at 21.46/21.62 pct vs opening's 21.90/22.40 pct.
* CPI rose 2.9 pct in January against a 1.3 pct rise in December, bringing year-on-year inflation down to 18.1 percent.
